TextView.android:text: 1x 30kg Muscle Up
x4 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
10 Pull Ups ---> 10 Muscle Ups ---> 10 Straight Bar Dips ---> 10 Pull Ups
x1 Set (3-4 mins rest)
8 Pull Ups ---> 8 Muscle Ups ---> 8 Straight Bar Dips ---> 8 Pull Ups
x2 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
5 Pull Ups ---> 5 Muscle Ups ---> 5 Straight Bar Dips ---> 5 Pull Ups
x3 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
1 Muscle Up ---> 3 seconds Straddle Planche Hold (Straight after the Muscle Up)
x5 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
8 seconds V-Sit Hold ---> 1x 90 Degree Handstand Push Up + 10 seconds pause at the bottom
x5 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
3x 150kg Squats
x4-5 Sets (3-4 mins rest inbetween sets)
10x 100kg Squats
x3 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
Max 80kg Front Squats
x3 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
Max 20kg Pistol Squats (E/S)
x3-4 Sets (2-3 mins rest inbetween sets)
Max Glute Ham Raises ---> Max 80kg One-Legged Calf Raises
x5 Sets (2-3 mins rest inbetween sets)
5x 90kg Dips
x3 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
10x 60kg Dips ---> 5x 10kg Ring Muscle Ups ---> 10x 10kg Ring Dips
x3 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
1 Ring L-Sit Muscle Ups ---> 10 seconds L-Sit Hold ---> 5 seconds Front Lever Hold ---> 5 seconds Back Lever Hold
x5 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
5-8 seconds Straddle Planche Hold ---> 3 Handstand Push Ups ---> 5 seconds V-Sit Hold
x5 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
Stretching, Mobility, Foam Rolling and Rest.
6x 60kg Pull Ups ---> 6x 10kg Muscle Ups
x4-5 Sets (3-4 mins rest inbetween sets)
Max One Arm Pull Ups (E/S) ---> 5 Muscle Ups
x4 Sets (2-3 mins rest inbetween sets)
Max 30kg Pull Ups
x2 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
5 Front Lever Pull Ups ---> 5-10 seconds Front Lever
x5 Sets (2-3 mins rest inbetween sets)
2 seconds Planche Hold ---> 4 seconds Straddle Planche Hold
x5 Sets (2-3 mins rest inbetween sets)
5 seconds V-Sit Hold ---> 2x 90 Degree Handstand Push Ups ---> 2 Handstand Push Ups ---> 10 seconds Tucked Planche Hold
x5 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
Max Front Lever Hold
x5 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
Max 130kg Squats
x5 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
Max 100kg Front Squats
x5 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
Max 80kg Lunges (E/S) ---> Max 20kg Pistol Squats (E/S)
x4 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
Max Glute Ham Raises
x5 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
End of Advanced Program Level 5 - Week 1
RATE YOUR PERFORMANCE
This workout must be repeated until 1 rep of 30kg Muscle Ups can be done without breaking the set.
